amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $4,751,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by 4,751,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 256 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 256 (Roll no. 317).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
